billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Requires port authority of New York and New Jersey to make automated external defibrillators available throughout major air terminals
summary: Requires the port authority of New York and New Jersey to make automated external defibrillators available throughout major air terminals; requires that training be provided to airport personnel in their use; provides that activation of a defibrillator will alert emergency medical services personnel.
lawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to the provision of automated external defibrillators
